attributes.title: disappointed
attributes.review: i got this app in high hopes of being able to stop seeing all of the inequalities in the world!! really looking forward to blinding myself by being surrounded by bigotry and racism :// unfortunately all it did was crash my phone and send all of my data to the russians.

attributes.title: Sue 🥴✨ then make it aside🧚‍♀️✨🌸💕
attributes.review: This is the WORST APP IVE EVER SEEN. i hope it gets taken down❤️ bunker boi is complete and utter trash and he deserves everything that’s happening to him ;) adios bunker boi and all his little trashy supporters 😻✨ au revoir

attributes.title: No
attributes.review: This app is really giving me bad vibes and doesn't seem like a smart source of information.

attributes.title: Recording??
attributes.review: Open to the app to see our current president looking mighty. I noticed a red flash… Is the app recording me? Who knows… Wouldn’t be surprised.

attributes.title: 🤮THE WORST 🤮
attributes.review: This app made me throw up inside. My organs are shookkkkkkkkkkkkk. I cant look at this orange chicken nugget for any longer. One way you can improve this app is by putting PRESIDENT OBAMA instead of Donald trump. 🤮

attributes.title: Not a joke
attributes.review: This app keeps making my phone lag and when I go on it it kicks me off

attributes.title: I would give it 0 stars
attributes.review: Hello I hate this app genuinely the worst app created I’m pretty sure if I don’t know the Chinese created this app it would have been better oh speaking of Chinese DONT DELETE TIK TOL YOU IDOT THATS CENSORSHIP

attributes.title: I hate it
attributes.review: It’s took years to download but once it did my phone started vibrating and breaking down with how many racist tweets trump posted AWFUL APP DO NOT DOWNLOAD

attributes.title: Not fair for people who use tik tok
attributes.review: Stupid that he is trying to delete a app that over millions of people use every day

attributes.title: this app is terrifying!
attributes.review: Alright so I downloaded this app to see what trump had planned if he won, and when I opened it up, TRUMP LITERALLY CAME OUT OF THE SCREEN AND STRANGLED ME!!! I was so scared! I’m definitely scared him, he tried to kill me!!
